thread.title: Rajan blasts IMF for being soft on policies
thread.title_full: Rajan blasts IMF for being soft on policies

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Rajan blasts IMF for being soft on policies
text:
Mumbai, October 19
Reserve Bank Governor Raghuram Rajan today took his umbrage against the accommodative monetary policies of the developed nations to the doors of the IMF and blamed it for remaining a sideline player and even praising such polices which are wreaking havoc in emerging markets. It must look out for and contain the spillover effects of the near-decade long easy flow of hot money, he said. His comments are significant as the Governor is slated to address the IMF meeting next month in Turkey. "The IMF is supposed to look at easy money polices in a global sense, but it has been sitting on the sidelines, and even applauding these kinds of policies ever since they were initiated and hasn't really questioned the value of these kinds of policies," Rajan said. PTI
